message:
Asian Human Rights Commission Report on Hasina Govt Genocide :


( However, several internet reports have mentioned that the number of deaths could be as high as 2,500 or more. Pictures of dead bodies have also been distributed over the internet. Major news channels in Bangladesh have been silenced. Two private television channels that were showing live pictures of the attacks upon the demonstrators were immediately closed down)
http://www.humanrights.asia/news/ahrc-news/AHRC-STM-088-2013
